div.p:
Victory on the open battlefields will keep our enemies in
check, but we'll need to master the art of siege battles before we can

take their lands. Sieges demand new strategies from the
attacker and the defending force.

In this encounter, we're charged with taking the enemy castle;
a fiercely defended stronghold that will test our men and our tactics.

As we learned in the land battle essentials tutorial, we'll
spend the deployment phase setting up our army, forming groups
and setting formations for the assault on the walls.

Our objective, as the attacker, is to capture the keep or "tenshu"
located in the centre of the castle. We can also win by

annihilating the defending force. Our troops need to battle
their way through the defences to get to the enemy, so
we'll need to breach those castle walls.
